component.name: openTerfaceQT
component.summary: A Qt-based interface for interacting with openterface-Mini-KVM, open-source software.

description.p: openTerfaceQT is a cross-platform Qt-based application that supports both aarch64 and x86 architectures. It serves as a comprehensive control interface for openterface-Mini-KVM devices.
